document_data.name: Oil of Stillness
document_data.mainbody: '''''Oil of stillness''''' was a magical substance that originated from the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
document_data.Powers: When poured into violent seas ''oil of stillness'' would have a calming effect on the water around the ship similar to the ''[[calm water]]'' spell. This effect last for one hour but worked for both normal and magical waves.
document_data.Description: ''Oil of stillness'' typically came in a {{SI|1|pt|long=yes}} flask.
